name: What’sYourStory
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Journalist and Storytelling Expert, April Adams Pertuis, shares daily tips and inspiration to help you learn valuable ways to incorporate storytelling into your business and communication. Whether it's for social media, live presentations, or email/marketing -- using stories is a powerful way to connect your brand to your ideal audience. 

April brings a lot of fun and energy to the world of storytelling, focusing on the human elements that make us all tick. These short, daily briefings are sure to inspire you and get you thinking more about your own story.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
